thread.title: Odom Leaves Las Vegas Hospital For Los Angeles, Kardashian Care - CBS Local
thread.title_full: Odom Leaves Las Vegas Hospital For Los Angeles, Kardashian Care - CBS Local - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: CBS Local
title: Odom Leaves Las Vegas Hospital For Los Angeles, Kardashian Care - CBS Local
text:
LAS VEGAS - Lamar Odom left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, a family representative said Tuesday. The former NBA star was transported by helicopter from Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center in Las Vegas around 5 p.m. Monday, according to a statement from Alvina Alston, publicist for Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer.
 CBS Local.
